text: @PressSec #HermanCain died because he signed a permission slip to get #Covid19 at #TulsaTrumpRally . The fact is that our @POTUS called this a #fakevirus & by doing so help spread the #pandemic leading to the deaths 150,000 americans. He brings death where ever he goes. https://t.co/bruEnVHGow
